sourcesContent:
Wizard tab pane item 1

Step 1

Enter your account information
User name is required. User name must be at least 5 character long. User name must be no more than 20 characters long. Only letters and numbers are allowed.
First name is required. First name must be at least 3 character long. First name must be no more than 25 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "ñ" and "ñ" are allowed.
Last name is required. Last name must be at least 3 character long. Last name must be no more than 25 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "ñ" and "ñ" are allowed.
organization name is required. organization name must be at least 3 character long. organization name must be no more than 30 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "ñ" and "ñ" are allowed.
Email address is required. Must be a valid email address.
Country address is required.
State address is required.
Phone number is required. Must be a valid phone number.
Phone number is required. Must be a valid date.
Role is required.
Identification is required. Must be a valid identification.
additional info is required. additional info must be at least 10 character long. additional info must be no more than 50 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "ñ" and "ñ" are allowed.
